name: Fin 'n' Kit [Alpha]
description:
Fin and Kit are new buddies, enjoying a friendship built on their shared love of fish. Join them as they search for fish together and go on an adventure!

Free Alpha!

Download the Alpha version of Fin 'N' Kit for free!

Be a tester!

Learn more about contributing to Fin 'N' Kit's development! You can get a free copy of the full game and your name in the credits!

http://www.moosader.com/2016/08/looking-for-fin-n-kit-testers/

Two-key gameplay

Juggle Fin and Kit throughout the levels! Using either the mouse or the UP and DOWN arrow keys, Fin and Kit jump independently of each other to collect trinkets and avoid obstacles.

Build your own levels

The Fin 'N' Kit level editor is included in the game, which can be used to build your own levels as well!

Adventure!

Follow Fin and Kit's story through cutscenes in each world, then guide them through the levels on their fishing adventure!

Alpha build

Fin 'n' Kit is still under development! Features will be added, bugs will be fixed, art and audio will be tweaked, and more worlds will be added!

Any early gameplay testing and feedback is greatly appreciated!
